PageTitle: peer advertise-community (BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv4 address family view)
FuncDef:
The peer advertise-community command configures a device to advertise community attributes to its peer.
The undo peer advertise-community command cancels the existing configuration. The peer advertise-community command configures a device to advertise community attributes to its peer. The undo peer advertise-community command cancels the existing configuration. By default, a device does not advertise community attributes to any peer.
ParentView: BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 peer address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: To configure a device to advertise community attributes to a specified peer or peer group, run the peer advertise-community command. If the command is run on the local device for a peer group, all the members in the peer group will inherit the configuration. This simplifies the application of routing policies and facilitates route maintenance and management.
